local_intent: Execute the primary diagonal push on block_T (0.2m at 135°) after alignment and yaw set; then verify against target_slot with corrective nudge if needed and retreat.
coherence_with_global: Matches global flow: perceive block, align, set yaw to 45°, perform main push (0.2 @135°), fine-align at target_slot, optionally issue 0.1 corrective push, and retreat.
